content.content0: The Computer Science Department at CMU offers a rigorous and practical undergraduate program focused on real-world problem solving.
content.content1: Join us to advance computer knowledge and innovation through our Master's program in computer science. Gain the skills to tackle complex tech challenges and collaborate on diverse projects with experts.
content.content2: Computer science research is the focus. Graduates of CMU who earned doctoral degrees make contributions to the field through creative research. Their writing should be published internationally.

about.detail0: The Department of Computer Science will be a leader in computer science. and information technology at the regional, national and international level, along with developing the quality of graduates and quality research.
about.detail1: Providing higher education By focusing on excellence academic and quality according to international standards
about.detail2: Produce research work at both basic and applied levels in the field computer science to be able to solve problems and develop the country's society.
about.detail3: Provide academic services to society to meet needs. of the community and country
about.detail4: Preserve arts, culture and good ethics
about.detail5: Guidelines for the administration of the department to achieve its vision and mission consist of 7 strategies as follows:
about.detail9: Academic service strategy to the community
about.detail10: Art preservation strategy Culture, ethics and environment
about.detail13: Computer Science Department going from nothing The Department of Mathematics houses the Computer Science program, which was established to further the subject of computer science. During the 1987 academic year, in February. gotten the go-ahead from the university affairs office to start the computer science department. The department now offers graduate-level programs at the bachelor's, master's, and doctorate levels in both regular and special semesters under both Plan A and Plan B. More than 1000 students have graduated with bachelor's degrees from it, while more than 200 have earned master's degrees. Being the company's owner benefits the company's staff members, academics, public servants, and others.
about.detail14: The academic members of the department have conducted research in a variety of areas, including theory of computation, bioinformatics, natural language processing (NLP), biomedical engineering, software engineering, networking, evolutionary algorithms, etc.
about.detail15: Academic support to promote information transfer and intellectual interchange among researchers, students, and students, the department has hosted a number of workshops, seminars, and conferences. The academic NCSEC conference and the Computer Olympiad competition were held in 2010 at the department. 6th level nationally
about.detail16: The department has a memorandum of agreement in place for collaboration with other colleges both domestically and internationally. with top universities like National Chung Cheng University (Taiwan), University of Woolongon (Australia), Armstrong Atlantic State University (America), etc.
about.detail17: Department personnel are Committed to developing the department into a first-class department Vanguard of the country to be consistent with the vision of the Department of Computer Science, which is a department that focuses on producing quality graduates with international research excellence and resources are provided for development leading to self-reliance.
